extendedInfo.description: The iPlanner, the Annual Meeting Planner mobile application, allows users to search or browse 2011 meeting sessions or to create a customized itinerary. The application syncs with the online Meeting Planner, so any itinerary changes made online will automatically update to your mobile version. Other features include:â¢Ability to search for nearby sessionsâ¢Ability to add and e-mail annotations to sessions in your itineraryâ¢Interactive map of McCormick Place that plots session locations â¢Exhibitor list, including company descriptions and booth numbers that link to exhibit mapâ¢Twitter feed that highlights exactly what ASCO staff, members, and attendees are saying about the Annual Meeting

reviews.comment: Not to be depended on! Freezes everytime I go to my calendar. Does not sync and now all my itenerary erased. I have samsung captivate, android OS
reviews.author: A Google User
